title: SET_ENTITY_COORDS
content:
0xDF70B41B// SetEntityCoords
void SET_ENTITY_COORDS(Entity entity, float xPos, float yPos, float zPos, BOOL alive, BOOL deadFlag, BOOL ragdollFlag, BOOL clearArea);Parameters:entity: The entity to change coordinates for.xPos: The X coordinate.yPos: The Y coordinate.zPos: The Z coordinate, ground level.alive: Unused by the game, potentially used by debug builds of GTA in order to assert whether or not an entity was alive.deadFlag: Whether to disable physics for dead peds, too, and not just living peds.ragdollFlag: A special flag used for ragdolling peds.clearArea: Whether to clear any entities in the target area.Sets the coordinates (world position) for a specified entity, offset by the radius of the entity on the Z axis.This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native SET_ENTITY_COORDS.
codeBlocks:
// SetEntityCoords
void SET_ENTITY_COORDS(Entity entity, float xPos, float yPos, float zPos, BOOL alive, BOOL deadFlag, BOOL ragdollFlag, BOOL clearArea);
